block.p: Marity Brody and Michael P. Smith were married yesterday by Msgr. Daniel A. Peake in the Lady Chapel of St. Patrick's Cathedral in New York.

Mrs. Smith, 41, manages the art buying department at Saatchi & Saatchi, the advertising agency, in New York. She graduated from Connecticut College. She is a daughter of Rita Brody of Westport, Conn., and the late James D. Brody. Her father was a special agent in civil rights for the F.B.I. in New York.
Marity Brody and Michael P. Smith were married yesterday by Msgr. Daniel A. Peake in the Lady Chapel of St. Patrick's Cathedral in New York.

Mrs. Smith, 41, manages the art buying department at Saatchi & Saatchi, the advertising agency, in New York. She graduated from Connecticut College. She is a daughter of Rita Brody of Westport, Conn., and the late James D. Brody. Her father was a special agent in civil rights for the F.B.I. in New York.

Mr. Smith, 51, is the president of the New York Bankers Association, a commercial banking organization. He graduated from Cornell University. He is a son of Muriel B. Smith of Jupiter, Fla., and the late Charles W. Smith, who retired as the president of the chemicals division of Pfizer, the pharmaceuticals maker in New York. The bridegroom was a widower.
